product_name: Lizard Skins Super Jumbo Chainstay Protector
long_description: Lizard Skins chainstay protector effectively prevents nicks and scratches to your frame while reducing the noise of chain slap. Designed to fit oversized aluminum frames. Sewn with a heavy-duty thread and a tight stitch for added strength and durability. Wraps around the chainstay and secures with a rip-and-stick closure.
short_description: Lizard Skins chainstay protector effectively prevents nicks and scratches to your frame while reducing the noise of chain slap.
